{{title|operator-{{small|(ranges::transform_view::''sentinel'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/transform_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|
friend constexpr ranges::range_difference_t&lt;Base&gt;
    operator-( const /*iterator*/&lt;Const&gt;&amp; x, const /*sentinel*/&amp; y )
        requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;,
                                         ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|
friend constexpr ranges::range_difference_t&lt;Base&gt;
    operator-( const /*sentinel*/&amp; y, const /*iterator*/&lt;Const&gt;&amp; x )
        requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;,
                                         ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Computes the distance between the underlying iterator of {{c|x}} and the underlying sentinel of {{c|y}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|transform_view::''sentinel''&lt;Const&gt;}}|plural=yes}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|an {{lt|cpp/ranges/transform_view/iterator}}}}
{{par|y|a sentinel}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Let {{tti|current_}} denote the underlying iterator, {{tti|end_}} denote the underlying sentinel.
@1@ {{c|1= x.current_ - y.end_}}
@2@ {{c|1= y.end_ - x.current_}}
